trips.name: Grand Canyon National Park
trips.description: Vast red rock canyon carved by the Colorado River.
trips.long_description: Stretching 277 miles long and over a mile deep, the Grand Canyon reveals nearly two billion years of Earth's history.

trips.name: Niagara Falls
trips.description: Massive waterfalls between the US and Canada.
trips.long_description: Niagara Fallsâ€™ massive cascades send over 3,000 tons of water per second tumbling down its cliffs.

trips.name: Carhenge
trips.description: Stonehenge replica made entirely from vintage cars.
trips.long_description: Carhenge recreates the famous monument using 38 old automobiles painted gray and arranged in the same proportions as the original.
